attributes.action: Freeze Student Loans Interest in the UK
attributes.additional_details: As we've started to face increasingly more economic uncertainty as a result of the impact that Covid-19 is having on our communities, we ask that the Student Loan Company reduces interest rates to 0% on all existing loans. This is a measure that has already been applied by the United States and one that would definitely help ease the financial burden on early graduates in the upcoming months.
attributes.background: The Department of Education and the Student Loan Company should freeze all interest applied on Student Loans starting from the month of March 2020.
